name: Prison Matrix
desc: Gain +50% armor . Can be placed in a Matrix Terminal.
notes:
The Prison Matrix is a boss item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the  Alloyed Collective expansion. 
It is dropped by the Solus Coffer interactable in   Solutional Haunt.
The primary use of the item is to activate the Matrix Terminal blocking the Loot Vault in Solutional Haunt, and unlocking Drifter, if the lobby does not have her unlocked.
But it also has the bonus effect of increasing base armor by 50%. This effect does not stack with multiple of the item.
With the help of the Wandering CHEF, it can also be used to turn the  Encrypted Cerebellum into the  Exposed Cerebellum.


== Notes ==
As this item only affects a survivor's base armor, this item effectively does nothing for most survivors and has no effect on items that grant additional armor.
For survivors that do have base armor, it would only add 10 armor, or 6 armor for   MUL-T
The armor gained is considered a buff, allowing it to count towards  Growth Nectar.
